name: OBI Real Estate
description: OBI’s utility token, called “OBI Coin”, is used within the OBI platform. This utility token will be the key component for transactions within the OBI platform. OBI Coin makes transactions faster, more secure, and more reliable than ever. OBI Coin backs every aspect of the OBI platform; including but not limited to, cutting-edge software, digital wallets, plug-ins, and any monetary exchanges. OBI platform is projected to become the most reliable, trustworthy and most used platforms. OBI Coin will be the driving force and energy that sustains and builds this powerful infrastructure and functionalities. Since OBI Coin is on OBI blockchain, OBI can control the fees associates to ensure transaction costs are as low as possible and not gouge the community.
